1.content: The type of story. Will the guys shrink or will the girls grow?
1.title: Choosing the story type.

11.content: Pick your victim, and them go from there.
11.title: The shrink victim

111.content:
Yusuke,although popular to the people that watch his adventures,isn't very popular around his own allies and enemies. He is smart mouthed, violent, and loves to ditch school (reminds me of my youth), so he is intentionally going to be shrunk.

Question is,by who?
111.title: On purpose

1111.content:
Yusuke didn't have any Spirit World missions, but he still ditched school and responsibility. Keiko was a bit concerned about this. What if he never had to go on a another mission and missed out on an education or something like that?

"I'm really concerned about Yusuke. Maybe if I kept him in line things would be easier." she said to herself,looking through her closet. Suddenly she found a little device she made in elementary school. You guessed it,a shrink gun.

"Maybe this'll work." she says to herself. Yusuke knocked on the door.

"Thats right. Hes taking me out today." she says, walking to the door. As soon as she opened it, she open fired,shrinking Yusuke down to a few inches tall.

"Now I know how Kuwabara felt when....hey! What gives Keiko!?" Yusuke shouted.

Whats her reaction to this entire situation?
1111.title: Science over Spirit

choices: She does something a bit more creative
11111.content:
To say Yusuke was caught off guard would be the understatement of the year. He was just going to take Keiko for a nice walk around town, something he couldn't care less about but Keiko wanted to do, so he begrudgly accepted.

Now he's shrimp size, with a giant Keiko standing over him. Keiko just stared down at him, not believing her eyes. Seeing Yusuke, her long time friend so small stunned her a bit.

“Hey! Earth To Keiko!” Yusuke said in a sour mood “Keiko get your head out of the clouds and answer me!”

“Wow Yusuke, i almost didn't see you down there” Keiko said in a joking manner, after getting over the initial shock. She wore a smile on her face.

“Keiko, why the hell did you shrink me!” Yusuke asked straight to the point. Keiko just turned her head and moved her brown hair out of the way from her ear.

“What was that Yusuke, your gonna have to speak up. I cant here you from all the way up here” Keiko teased again.

“Keiko!”

“Oh your probably wondering why i shrunk you, right Yusuke” She said looking at him again “Well i shrunk you because, I'm sick of it Yusuke. You ditching school and ruining your future! Im here to put an end to it”

“What!” Yusuke said a little surprised “You never gave a damn about it before”

“Yes i did! You just wouldn't listen!” Keiko argued back, her voice being much louder “Thats why i did this”

“You shrunk me down to Scold me!”

“Well, at first but looking at you now. I think we can have some fun with you at that size” Keiko said with a sly smirk. Normally when they play, Yusuke is the one to tease her out of enjoyment. Always living up skirt and poking her bum. Now... now its Keiko’s time to have some fun “Now let me get you inside, before my Neighbours Cat comes and eats you”

Keiko crouched down and with her free hand grabbed Yusuke. Yusuke of course tried to resist but there wasn't much he could do to Keiko at this size. Granted unless he wants to blast her with his Spirit Gun.

Keiko brings Yusuke to her face smiling at him. Deciding to tease him a bit more Keiko said.“You know your a lot more manageable this size”

“So what! We still going around town!” Yusuke snapped back as Keiko shook her head.

“Not now. I doubt you'd be able to keep up with my pace. So i think we can just hang out in my room. And we can have fun, you know like we did when we were kids.” Keiko said “And maybe i can actually get you to listen for once”

Keiko didn't even wait for his response as she lowered her hand and started walking up to her room. ideas racing through her mind about what to do with Yusuke. So many opportunities, and since she's in charge. She can take as much time as she wants doing it
11111.title: Playful Keiko

choices: Go for the holes to get out and yell at Keiko some more
stay put and wait for her
11112.content:
Keiko looked at Yusuke and realized her mistake.

"Keiko what the hell did you do!" Yusuke yelled trying ot keep the cursing to a minimum. His face was getting red.

"It's for your own good Yusuke. You need to go to school. You have no idea if you'll ever go on another Spirit Mission or not. Koenma is probably being nice enough to leave you alone for a while. Especially since the Dark Tournament just ended." She looked down at the boy she loved and sighed.

She picked him up off of the floor and put him on her dresser.

"You know what Keiko!" Yusuke yelled trying to get Keiko's attention. "I will never forgive you for this-"

He was cut off by Keiko putting a syrafom cup over him. Their were two holes in the top.
11112.title: Intervention

choices: "So look what i did to my love, Girls."
Oh,Yusuke, I got you some friends."
111122.content:
Well, I was already too tired to yell, so I decided to wait for Keiko to come back. "Man this sucks." I said to myself. All of a sudden I heard Keiko coming back so I decided to do one thing: Play dead.
Just then Keiko said...
111122.title: Play Dead.

choices: Keiko reappears with Botan, Shizuru, and Yukina
They try to escape their imprisonment before Keiko comes back
1111222.content:
Hearing Keiko's voice again was the last thing he needed. Yusuke did not really understand Keiko's motives for shrinking him nor did he even care. He wanted his usual freedom, deliquent style, while not on Spirit Detective duty. He could only watch from his glass imprisonment in the girl's room as he waited for his captor to come up. Whatever Keiko had in store for him, Yusuke was ready to deal with the news.

"Oh, Yusuke!" Keiko's voice rang louder.

Great... What does she want now? Yusuke thought.

Keiko returned upstairs, holding another reversed styrofoam cup in her hands with several tiny holes on its bottom and a tiny piece of cardboard covering its mouth, on top the pal of her hand. She opened the top of Yusuke's confinement and out came from her possession Kurama, Hiei, and even Kuwabara, shrunken down to Yusuke's diminutive size. The three allies landed near their friend with Kuwabara landing headfirst on the ground.

"I also shrunk your friends too," Keiko said, winking without a hint of remorse.

"Why in hell did you do that?!" Yusuke shouted. Kurama rubbed his head, shaken from the ride while Hiei looked indifferently at the clumsy Kuwabara.

"Well, I orginally thought about keeping you small to keep you in order," Keiko explained. "But this fun thought came to mind! While I do respect the four of you keeping order between the real world and the spirit world, I think that shrinking you guys will help you lighten up from all of it."

"Hmph, not my idea of lightening up," Hiei said, glaring at the giant girl. Behind his white headband, the dark light silhoutte of his Jagan lit up.

"Hiei, what are you doing?" Kurama asked.

"Yusuke, I mean no offense to you or your girlfriend, but she made the biggest mistake of her life by messing with me like this," Hiei said, holding his right arm up. It looked as though he was going to summon the Dragon of the Darkness Flame to punish the giant Keiko.

"Hiei, you do realize that she used Botan's Mystic Whistle to draw you here after successfully deceiving Kuwabara and myself," Kurama said. "She shot you first before you recovered from the whistle's call and escaped and we were easily prey to her."

"Yeah, which is why she's-ugh!" Hiei shouted, falling on his knee. The black flames that surrounded his arm dissipated. "Wh-where's... my dragon?!"

Kurama looked at him ponderingly, taking out a blood red rose that he kept in his long red hair. Holding it in the air, he swung at it down, testing his theory on why Hiei's Darkness Dragon disappeared.

"Rose Whip!" Kurama shouted. The rose did not extend into the throny whip he often used in battle. He remained the same, save it for a few red petals drifting off its head from the swing.

"Kurama?" Yusuke asked.

"Just as I thought; our shurken state has weakened our spirit powers and abilities," Kurama explained. "We can't use techniques to break free from here."

"And since I know you won't break out of here, I'll be back for the real fun," Keiko said, making a peace sign and winked. "I can't believe I didn't think of this sooner! Be right back, boys!"

Keiko left her room, leaving the shrunken team to themselves. Whatever they had to break out was worthless now due to their shunken states. And who knew what Keiko would do to them as punishment if they were caught free.

"Well, this sucks," Hiei sad, lying on the glass wall. "We've been captured by the detective's girlfriend and forced to be her playthings."

"Relax, Hiei," Kurama said, optimistic. "I don't think Keiko would do anything bad at us."

"Maybe, but she's a smart girl," Yusuke said.

"You mean, she knows a way to torture us without... torturing us?" Kuwabara asked.

"Don't think, Kuwabara, or whatever's left of your brain from your fall will melt," Hiei scoffed.

"You got something to say, even shorter shrimp?!" Kuwabara shouted, all in front of Hiei's face.

"Guys, stop fighting!" Yusuke shouted, pulling Kuwabara away.

"He's right," Kurama said. "Let's at least try to escape before our captor comes back. We all know she's too nice to give us any horrible punishments."
1111222.title: Spirit Team Captured

choices: Each girl has her tiny captive massage her feet.
They plan on a different group activity.
11112221.content:
"There's got to be a major misunderstanding! I don't belong here!" Kuwabara cried, slamming his fists upon the glass containment that trapped him and his allies within.

"Hmph, throwing a tandrum; why am I not surprised?" Hiei scoffed, looking away from the approaching, enraged Kuwabara.

"You got something to say, shorter stack?!" Kuwabara shouted, attempting to grab Hiei by his white scarf, but failed after forgetting about Hiei's swiftness. Hiei disappeared and reappeared next to Kuwabara, holding up his shrunken katana near his neck.

"I would never try that on me," Hiei adviced.

Kuwabara trembled, unable to fight back since his shrunken state had prevented the use of his own Spirit Sword. He relaxed when Hiei finally withdrew his sword.

"You guys should not be fighting," Kurama said.

"And instead, help us on getting out of here before Keiko comes back!" Yusuke added.

The small team started to hear voices coming outside of Keiko's room. Familiar voices. They were higher-pitched and feminine. One thought races across the minds of the shrunken guys; their faces were appalled at the thought of it.

"Yusuke, this is your final warning," Hiei said, pointing at Yusuke. "Your girlfriend is definitely going to 'get it' if she humiliates me like this again."

"Hiei, chill," Yusuke said. "I still don't know why Keiko shrunk you guys when she only wanted me."

"Here they come!" Kuwabara shouted, frantically pointing at the slightly ajar door.

The bedroom door opened up with Keiko leading, followed by the female friends she made since her discovery of Yusuke fighting supernatural creatures: Botan, the cheery Spirit World guide; Shizuru, Kuwabara's older sister; and even Yukina, an innocent ice maiden/apparition who was known as Hiei's sister to all but herself, Keiko, and Kuwabara.

"There they are, girls!" Keiko pointed out the durable glass jar left on the table, containing Team Urameshi. "I told you girls I've done."

"No way!" Botan exclaimed, peering up close with Yukina on the tiny captives. "You guys are cute for being small, not counting Hiei at his former height!"

Hiei fumed, crossed his arms, and looked away from the two girls.

"Hey, Yukina!" Kuwabara greeted, running up to Yukina's face, but collided with the transparent glass barrier that trapped him.

"Wow! So you've got Kazuma, Yusuke, Kurama, ... and Hiei," Yukina said, focusing her glimpse on him. She could not help but feel something for the one who secretly watched over her with his Jagan, making sure she was safe and happy.

"It doesn't surprise me that you got Kazuma, but how did you even get a hold of Kurama and Hiei?" Shizuru asked, disposing her last cigarette.

"Simple: Kurama did not suspect me, of all people, to pull this kind of stunt and I stunned Hiei with the Mystic Whistle and shrunk him first before he got away," Keiko explained.

"Okay, so now what?" Shizuru asked.

Keiko picked up the jar holding Yusuke, Kuwabara, Kurama, and Hiei in with both hands, slowly opening the hole-tattered top. She unsealed the top and held it in front of the small group girls.

"How about we each take a boy to play and spend time with?" Keiko suggested. "Just don't pick Yusuke."

Botan, Shizuru, and Yukina grinned, glancing at the jar while the guys made no attempts at escape. Yusuke glared back at the giant girls, Kurama paced about slowly upon their current predicament, Kuwabara was blowing kisses to Yukina, and Hiei sat at the corner.

"You sure it's okay by them?" Yukina asked.

"We're not going to hurt them, we're just getting the advantage over these guys," Keiko said. "They really need to lighten up in spite of all the fighting they do."

"Yukina! Pick me!" Kuwabara shouted at the top of his lungs, hopping wildly for his love interest's attention. A hand swooped in and grabbed Kuwabara tightly. "... Oh, man!"

"Sorry, bro, but she's way out of your league," Shizuru said to her tiny brother in her grip.

"My turn!" Botan exclaimed, looking upon the remaining choices. Yusuke was already taken by Keiko so the only choices for the perky guide were Kurama and Hiei. "Hmm... I think I'll toy with Hiei!"

Botan reached down to get him, but then felt a stinging sensation on her index finger. She reeled her hand back, seeing a scratch on her finger with little blood slowly dripping out.

"Shrunken or not, I will not be made a fool!" Hiei declared, sheathing his sword.

"Yukina, you can have him," Botan said, winking at the confused Ice Maiden.

"Uh, you sure he won't cut me?" Yukina asked.

"Trust me! You two are practically the same kin!" Botan exclaimed. Hiei glared at her, sending her a telepathic death message. By her body language, Botan turned away, shivering.

"Uh, okay," Yukina said. She reached into the jar to get Hiei. The latter looked at Kurama for advice, who could only shrug with a sheepish grin.

... Only for her, Hiei thought.

Hiei accepted his fate into Yukina's large, soft hand, not wanting to offend her as much as he dislike be "played" with.

"So I guess that leaves Kurama with me then," Botan said, using her other hand to take him out while sucking on the small wound Hiei left for her.

"Well, ladies, we have our guys!" Keiko exclaimed, taking out Yusuke and placing the empty jar back on the table. "What shall we do with them as a group?"
11112221.title: All Together

choices: Kurama managed to come up with a plan.
Botan interjects. "It isn't fair only Shizuru had her feet kissed!!"
111122211.content:
Each of the girls exchanged curious glances at the question; what could they agree on? No one spoke any ideas due to none coming to mind, Yukina was too pure to think of anything, Shizuru's ideas were too rough; the only people suited for coming up with something were Botan and Keiko, and they seemed to know it too. But even with this knowledge there were no ideas coming to mind.

Finally ever so bluntly Shizuru muttered, "How about we just have em give us a foot rub while we think this through?" Everyone, shrinkees included turned to look at Shizuru as if she had the plague. But after a couple minutes Yukina smiled and nodded, "Sounds like a good idea to me Shizuru. If they agree to it of course, I mean...I don't want to impose..."

Botan jumped in, "Oh relax, they'd love to do it...not that they have a choice."

"Pardon?"

"Oh nothing at all!"

With three girls approving it everyone turned to Keiko, who appeared slightly nervous. She nodded, "Well with all the yes' I don't wanna stand out. Sounds good to me." Every girl got close with their shrunken companion and held them close enough for all to hear. "Do you guys agree?" It was Yukina who bothered asking.

"Hell no! Little or not I ain't no masseuse."

"A real man doesn't submit like that! If it was Yukina maybe, but not for you sis!"

"I would never even think of degrading myself to something such as massaging a foot, even if it is Yukina's."

"We'd love too!"

"WHAT!?" Yusuke, Kuwabara, and Hiei all looked at Kurama as if he had gone off the deep end; in fact, Hiei had his hand on his blade already.

Kurama smiled softly and gave a peaceful gesture, whispering words too low for the giantesses to hear. "We have to play along, use your heads for a second." Clicking their respective tongues the rest of Team Urameshi fell silent; Kurama was as always, right.

"Sounds like they agree!" Botan exclaimed.

"Then let's do this." Shizuru grinned.

Quickly each girl removed their respective footwear and sat on the floor, in an X-Shaped pattern with Keiko across from Shizuru and Botan from Yukina. Their feet together seemed to wall the four who were at their soles. "Get to it!" Keiko mischievously winked.

Each member of Team Urameshi looked at their companions barefeet with apprehension. Yusuke wasn't too happy with Keiko's feet, being ever so busy she had a fair amount of sweat and Yusuke wanted no part of that. Botan was in a similar boat so Kurama was more or less in the same situation. Hiei apparently lucked out, being an Ice Maiden Yukina had no sweat along her soles and her feet were as pure as she was. Poor Kuwabara drew the short straw, Shizuru's feet were as sweaty as both Keiko and Botan's feet combined and appeared very tense; right now Kuwabara wished his sister didn't excersise daily.

Kuwabara pointed to Hiei. "Hey shorty! Only I deserve Yukina, I would show her feet the proper respect of a man. Hell I'd even kiss em to make her happy, but you...you don't deserve it. You two have nothing in common!!" Yusuke and Kurama had to bite their lips not to laugh.

Before Hiei could respond a loud voice from behind Kuwabara spoke, "Oh is that so lil bro? In that case I'm sure you'll do the same for your Big Sister. After all, we are family, and you would never trade me for some girl you're crushing on. Right?"

"Y-Yes Mistr- Sister!" Every girl (Except Yukina) looked at Shizuru almost fearfully, the shrunken men shook their heads at Kuwabara who had begun eagerly massaging to please his sister.

Kurama sighed, "It may not be ideal but this helps us think too. I recommend we begin before they grow impatient." With no delay Kurama got to work as well. With a click of their tongues Hiei and Yusuke wordlessly did too.

After a few moments it was clear how the massages were going; all we doing good but had very different effects. Yusuke was doing little more than barraging Keiko's feet with punches in an attempt to put enough force behind it; the end result being he was almost hitting too hard, he was doing a little bit more harm than good in the long run, but it felt sort of good. Being faster than holy hell Hiei was all over the place, in seconds he covered all of both of Yukina's feet, but he continued over and over so he could properly please his sister. Kurama massaged like he battled, like a tactician. He mentally evaluated the best spots and struck with precision, massaging almost as well as a professional. And again Kuwabara crapped out; because of his loud mouth he was forced to both kiss AND massage his sisters feet. And due to being forced to kiss, Kuwabara was unable to effectively massage, so he was doing little more than rubbing his hands into the squishy flesh of his sister as his lips made contact.

The results of each massage were clear on the girl's faces. Yukina and Botan appeared to be in heaven, smiling and even giggling occasionally. Keiko was smiling but every once in a while she'd make a small wincing sound. As for Shizuru....she had her eyes closed and her lips locked into a frown like she was a dominatrix....poor Kuwabara. All in all it could've been much worse, the feet of each girl wasn't that bad (Shizuru excluded.) and once the gang got into the massage they made sure to do it right. All the while Kurama was thinking up a plan and the others were leaving the plan to him.

Finally they soon finished, Yusuke was panting, Kurama and Hiei had faint sweat on their brow, and Kuwabara was collapsed in exhaustion. And there was still more to come...
111122211.title: Eight Feet, Four Tinies. Do the Math

11112222.content:
"So," Yusuke said, "Anybody got an idea on how we're supposed to move this damn glass that's sitting over us?" The team stared up at the glass above them, the four of them thinking the situation through.

Though the others had thought of this plan, Kuwabara was the first to vocalize it. "Why don't we just push the glass towards the edge of the dresser until it falls off?" he stated proudly.

"Because, you idiot, then we would fall too. And, on top of that, we would probably be killed by the broken shards waiting for us at the bottom." Hiei stated calmly, angering Kuwabara.

"Well," said Kurama, "If we were to push just enough over the edge to leave a gap we could squeeze through, we might be able to somehow climb down."

The team quickly agreed to this idea(no one could suggest anything better) and began the process of pushing the glass. They made a hole at the edge of Keiko's dresser just big enough for the pint-sized warriors to fit through.

"Well, any volunteers to go first?" Yusuke asked jokingly.

"We should send the one that's most likely to fall first. How about the idiot?" Hiei stated, glaring at Kuwabara.

"Shut up, you little shrimp!" Kuwabara fired back.

"We don't have time for this," Yusuke protested, "Keiko could be back any second!"
11112222.title: They try to escape their imprisonment before Ke...

112.content: What method would you like? I know a lot of people have different tastes in the cause of size change. Funny thing is,Kuwabara has already experienced the shrinking once before,so we can call him a veteran of this or something.
112.title: Cause

1121.content:
Kuwabara was up to his vigilante antics as usual. If he saw a kitten in a tree he'd climb up and rescue it. Just the kind of guy he was.

"Urameshi ain't around today. Shame,and I had my ass kicking attitude...." he was talking to himself when he heard a woman shriek in terror. He ran down to where the scream was and saw a teenaged gypsy girl being hassled by thugs.

"Looks like my attitude pays off!" he shouted, running at the group and proceeding to layeth the smackdown on all of them. The girl walked over and bowed to him.

"Thank you kind one. I hope your journey ahead is filled with adventure." she said before walking off. On the ground she dropped an amulet. Kuwabara picked it up and walked to her,but it was enchanted with an anti-theif spell,causing him to shrink down.

"Not again......." he said to himself,looking around. Loud footsteps were heard as a girl was coming closer. Who was it?
1121.title: Even good deeds have a price

choices: 3 inches and gradually shrinking from that point
1122.content:
During school, Kuwabara was taking a test. For some reason, he actually studied for it like that one time he had to get at least a 50 on it. But even though he was prepared, he still didn't feel alright.

He raised his hand. "Uh...may I go to the bathroom!?" he asked, clutching his stomach.

The teacher allowed him to go. Suddenly, he took off, running towards the bathroom. Then the shrinking began....what size is he?
1122.title: Kuwabara's sick

113.content:
Kurama was doing a little community service for his earlier crimes. Aparently Koenma wasn't letting him off easy, even though he. His mission was to wipe out a team of rogue demons.

This was easy,too easy.

One of the demons was a beautiful sorceress named Azuma. She had a crush on Kurama (what self respecting female Yu Yu fan doesn't?) and wanted to defend herself as well as protect Kurama and keep him safe,so she used a shrinking spell on him to fulfill all three of those things.

"You'll be all mine Kurama!" she thought to herself.

Does he shrink right before Azuma's eyes,or does the effect take a bit of time?
113.title: Love by shrinking

1131.content:
Kurama sensed something coming his way, but was unable to dodge the effect of the shrinking spell. Azuma smiled as she watched him diminish right before her very eyes.

What does she do with him?
1131.title: Instant results

choices: Kurama awakes to a still empty room.
1132.content:
"What have you done to me?" Kurama asked as he recognized the sensation of having a spell cast upon him.

"You will find out soon enough." the demon smiled in response.

Before he had a chance to react, the sorceress vanished, leaving Kurama solo as the spell took affect. Sighing in disconcerting thought, he began his walk back to town, but before he could reach his home, a terrible headache overtook him. Too far from his place and still unaware of what the demon had done to him, the red rose decided that it'd be best not to be alone, should the spell render him vulnerable. The closest place to him was Yusuke's, so he made his way to the spirit detective's house.

"Yusuke? Are you in here?" Kurama had to grab hold of the door frame to Yusuke's room in order to keep from crippling to the floor as the headache began to engulf his senses, but try as he might, unconsciousness soon grasped him and he fell to the floor of the empty room.
1132.title: What's happening?

11321.content:
Kurama ran a hand through his hair to get it out of his face as he sat himself up.

"Where am I?" he questioned as he tried to focus his dreary eyes on his unfamiliar surroundings.

"A transportation spell?" but that thought immediately fled as a sound like continuous explosions filled his demon ears. He turned around to find the cause and nearly stumbled back as a skyscraper sized Yusuke walked into the room, followed closely behind by Botan.

"This is important, Yusuke!" Botan scolded as the Spirit Detective leaned against the bottom of his bed, folding his arms.

"I don't really give a rat's ass. Today is my day off, and I intend to enjoy it. So you can just tell Koenma to shove it." Yusuke complained, unaware that his teammate just narrowly avoided being knocked out by his simple action of crossing his feet.

Botan wanted nothing to do with Yusuke's complaints and pulled out her communicator, setting the laptop like device on the bed, "Tell him yourself!" Koenma's shouting, childlike face flashed onto the screen, "Yusuke!!!"
11321.title: Oh dear...

114.content:
"Are you sure this is the place?" Yusuke asked as he looked around the circular clearing that his team had just stepped foot into.

"Yes," answered Botan, "I'm positive that this is the place. Koenma was very clear in his description. The demon should be here."

Hiei, arms crossed, walked a few steps forward, "Show yourself!" He heard no response and began to turn around, "This is a waste of my time. I'm leaving." Before he could complete his first step, a flash of bright light shot from a tree opposite the team and surrounded Hiei, freezing him in place.

"You will be going nowhere, my dark little demon." came a soft, seductive voice from the tree.

Suddenly, the light flashed brighter, then vanished, taking Hiei with it.

"Ahh! Where'd he go?!" Kuwabara shouted.

Yusuke clenched his fists as Botan held him back from charging at the unseen demon full force.

Kurama took a few steps forward, "What have you done with him?" he asked in his calm and collected voice.

"Oh come now, what fun would it be if I told you. I think I'll let you figure it out on your own. I shall return when the time is right to seal your fates." and with a shimmy in the leaves, the demoness was gone.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hiei shook his head as he began to prop himself up, "What the hell just happened?"

He stood up, brushing the dirt off his clothes and looked around, "What the?! Giant grass?"

'Kurama must be playing a trick on me...' he thought to himself. He turned on his heels to curse the fox, "KU..." but was cut off as a giant object slammed down in front of him, knocking him on his ass. Hiei shook it off and looked up to see what it was that had so easily knocked him to the ground, "..rama..." He stared in complete amazement at the youkai that was now towering over him like a mountain. He covered his ears as his teammate began to address the demoness.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Kurama stood perfectly still waiting to make sure that the demoness had definitely left. Kuwabara began to take a step toward Kurama, "Don't move!" he shouted at him, "Though she thought she was hidden, I caught site of her eyes. She kept glancing toward the ground. I think Hiei's still here. I can still sense him."

Botan looked at him, a bit confused, "Still here? Do you mean he's invisible?"

"Perhaps, or more likely he's..." Kuwabara cut Kurama off, "he's been shrunk..."

Kuwabara's face turned white as he remembered the torture he had gone through when Rando had shrunk him.

Kurama looked to the ground. The grass was too high to see anything, so very slowly, he knelt down and cautiously placed his finger tips against the dirt.

Hiei dashed to the side to avoid the approaching tree-sized fingers, his heart pounding as he tried to get a grasp the fact that this was actually happening to him.

Kurama concentrated and the grass began to recede back into the ground, revealing the earth below. He scanned the space before him and immediately stopped when his eyes locked on to the tiny demon staring up at him in disbelief.

"Hiei?" he asked as if he couldn't believe it was actually him.
114.title: What the?!

choices: Koenma answers! He's on his way!
1142.content:
Yusuke made his way over to Kurama and leaned over his shoulder to look at the now minuscule Hiei, who was trying to regain his composure. "Well this is just great. Now what?"

Kuwabara kept his distance, unsure whether he should be horrified at the thought that this new demon could shrink him as Rando had done, or to laugh his ass off at the now even shorter ego-headed shrimp.

"Perhaps we should go see Koenma. Maybe he knows a way to reverse it." Botan suggested.

"Yes," Kurama added, "I think that's our best bet." He lowered a hand for Hiei to climb onto.

"Oh, no! There's no way I'm letting you carry me! And there's even less chance I'll let you take me to Koenma's!" Hiei folded his arms and began to walk away from Kurama.

Kurama sighed, "Hiei, it's for the best."

"I don't really care. You're..." but his sentence was cut off when Kurama reached out and grabbed a hold of him.

"KURAMA!!! Put me down this instant! I will kill you for this!"

Yusuke couldn't help but laugh at the struggling dragon, "It's for your own good, so deal with it."

"I tell you what, Hiei," Kurama said, standing back up, "we'll compromise. We'll have Koenma come to us."

Hiei said nothing, inwardly trusting in Kurama and the rest of the team's judgment, but allowing the flames of rage to flash in his eyes at the whole situation.

Back at Yusuke's place, Botan called to Koenma.
1142.title: KURAMA!!!

11421.content:
"Well, Koenma should be here soon." Botan stated as she came over and sat down on Yusuke's bed, next to Kuwabara. Kurama had placed Hiei on top of a nearby desk, uncharacteristically clean for Yusuke. Kurama figured it was due to the fact that it was void of any traces of homework. He took a seat at the desk. Yusuke leaned against the wall, awaiting Koenma's arrival. They didn't have to wait long before he burst in the door in his teen form.

"What happened? What was so important that you had to call me out here?" Koenma watched as everyone's eyes lead his to the desktop where miniture fuming demon sat, arms crossed. Koenma stared in shock as he took a few steps closer to get a better look, before falling over, clutching his sides in a fit of laughter!

"That's it!!!" Hiei drew his sword and began to charge at the giant rolling on the floor in hysterics. Kurama noticed this and flung his hand out in front of his enraged comrade, earning himself a bloody finger as Hiei sliced his sword across it.

"Koenma, sir! Please!" Botan scolded, as she walked over and picked up a protesting little demon, "This is serious! Can you help him?"

Koenma choked back his laughter as he straightened himself up, "Well actually..."

Through blinding snow they trudged on, unsure of where they were going. It had been almost a full day it seemed and night was coming soon. Blisteringly cold night.

Finally, as the snow seemed it's worst, a vague figure appears in the distance. The two traveling companions, Jacob and Tina, looked at each other in surprise. Rushing forward though they felt exaustion taking it's toll. Before they could reach the myserious person, they collapsed in the fridged snow.

*****

Jacob awoke in a small cold hut. A fire crackled slowly in the middle of the cluttered room and Tina was nestled close to him under a thick bear fur that served as a blanket on the bed he lay upon.

The place sure was cluttered. It looked like some kind of scribes home, maybe a writers workshop. Books were strewn all over, as were clothes and other various trinkets. A few cupboards and a dresser lined the walls of the dome shaped enclosure, a desk sitting between the two pieces of furnature.

Strange little place to be out in the middle of the frozen wastelands.

Suddenly Jacob heard the crunch of someone trodding across the snow outside. Tina stirred finally too and sat up, rubbing her eyes. Pushing aside a bright tapestry that covered the entrance way, a girl in a light green kimono walked in.

Her long green hair fell straight behind her, almost like a tapestry itself, swaying as she walked. Her skin was light and soft as the snow, pale yet with a heathy radiance to it. Her head was down, eyes fixed on a bowl she was holding out of strange blue berries that neither Jacob nor Tina had seen before.

Starving, the two exchanged glances. Obviously this must be their rescuer. Surely she wouldn't be tricking them. Would she?

12.title: Lucky girl

121.content:
It was a relatively good day for the young Keiko Yukimura, she had just finished school for the day and was on her way home, her friend Yusuke Urameshi right next to her, begging her to go on a date.

"Come on Keiko! I'm sorry I stood you up last time! There was this huge ogre and-"

"And you had to leave me alone at the movies I get it Yusuke!" Keiko muttered in an upset tone. She held Yusuke's spirit beast Pu in her arms.

"Pu!" The little spirit being piped up, upset at the twos fighting.

Yusuke smiled nervously at Keiko, trailing at her side. "Come on!! I'll make it up to you tonight! We can-"

"No" Keiko cut him off.

"But we coul-"

"No"

"How ab-"

"NO!" Keiko screamed.

"Come on! I said I'm sorry! What can I do to make it up to ya?" Yusuke begged.

Keiko looked at Yusuke for a moment and smiled. "Well I suppose we coul-"

"Hey Yusuke!" A loud girly voice piped up from above. Yusuke and Keiko looked up to see their friend Botan the Grim Reaper in her pink outfit riding a broom.

"We have a job for you!" She called happily.

"Can't it wait?" Yusuke asked angrily, his hand glowing with his energy.

"No it can't! We have recieved reports of a B rank demon near the center of town!" Botan called, jumping onto the ground with Keiko and Yusuke.

Yusuke sighed and turned to Keiko. "I'm sorry." he apologized before running off with Botan close behind him, Keiko left where she was fuming.

"God he makes me so mad!" She mutter angrily, beginning to stomp her way home. Suddenly she felt an odd yet painful pulse radiate throughout her body.

"Not this again." She muttered, ever since Yusuke's return from the Dark Tournament Keiko had occasionally felt a shot of pain like this. She had asked Botan about it once and Botan explained it as the result of being around someone as powerful as Yusuke.

"You'll get used to it." She said confidently at the time, but this feeling was different from the rest Keiko had ever experienced. It felt...different as if it belonged to Keiko and wasn't just the result of Yusuke's energy.

The pain in Keiko subsided and was soon replaced with an odd feeling, not necessarily a bad one just odd. "What's happening?" Keiko asked aloud as she miraculously...began to grow!
121.title: A fight with Yusuke

"Am I...growing?" Keiko asked aloud as she now reached fifteen feet, a loud ripping noise from below told Keiko her shoes and socks were now destroyed. People began gathering around the amazon sized giantess, murmuring to themselves.

"Quit staring at me!" Keiko shrieked, slapping her hand against the crowd and actually swiping them all away, she was now thirty feet tall.

"When is this going to stop?!" Keiko screamed as she placed a hand on the top of a small building, her clothes had large tears everywhere in them at this point. Keiko's bare feet were the size of small cars now.

An on coming car didn't see the growing giantess until it was too late, with a horrific sounding screech the car swerved to its side and slammed into Keiko's ankle.

"Ow!" The giantess yelled, feeling as if she had been punched in the ankle. Another series of ripping noises told Keiko her skirt was gone and her azure panties stretched to their limits. Keiko had now approached fifty feet in height and was still going.

Looking nervously down at the town Keiko shuffled her feet in an attempt to avoid crushing anyone but her left foot found its way onto a car and caused Keiko to fall.

"Ahh!!" She screamed as she fell back, she could hear the terrified shrieks of people getting crushed under her massive frame. With her head on the street Keiko kept growing, her body was becoming to big for the street to hold her so buildings began to get forcefully pushed aside by her body.

Yet another loud rip caused Keiko to look down, her top had come off and her bra didn't look like it would last.

"Stop staring at me!" Keiko pleaded to the random citizens who could see her, she began to raise herself back up only to see she was now big enough to be seen by the entire town. She rivaled the tallest buildings and showed no signs of stopping her growth.

A loud pop was heard as Keiko's top literally burst from its hems leaving her chest exposed.

Blushing wildly Keiko shrieked and grabbed a nearby skyscraped, literally tearing it in half and using the part she ripped off as a cover for her chest. The feeling within Keiko didn't subside, in fact in continued to grow until Keiko felt her body would burst, This next growth would top all of her last ones.

With a loud moan that held a mixture of terror and pleasure Keiko's body began to expand once more, crushing several buildings beneath her growing feet. Keiko's forced her eyes shut, hoping it was all just a horrible dream but she opened them eventually and to her relief she seemed to have stopped growing; to her horror she was now at least 200 feet tall.

Looking down Keiko saw that she was completely exposed, the building she held gave way to her increasing size and strength. By her feet were people half the size of her toes who were just staring at her.....assets.

"Don't stare at me!" She screamed as she raised a foot and stepped over them all with it, crushing their frail bodies beneath her bare sole. Raising her foot Keiko gasped as she saw small splats of blood where the people were, examining her sole she saw blood oozing all over her foot. The last thing those people would ever remember was the smell and feeling of Keiko's bare foot.
12131.title: Keiko's growth

122.content: What season do you want this to be? Yukina will still grow,and a lot of stuff will happen, but this will effect the storyline of everything.
122.title: Storyline

1221.content:
All was on the line in this tournament. Yukina, along with her friends,had just arrived to see what was going on. Suddenly,a street vendor walked up to her,opening his trenchcoat. The coat was lined up and down with magic artifacts.

"Wow! Souveniers!" they said,looking at everything. One of them caught Yukina's eye,a beautiful platinum necklace with a light blue crystal on it.

"Ahh. You like? I am running a special on it. 2000 gil." the vendor said.

"Whats gil?" Keiko asked.

"Universal spirit and demon world money. The exchange rate is the same as yen." Yukina said, buying the necklace. Turns out it is a Crystal Ice artifact,and since shes an ice person,its gonna have size and magic powers,making her into the ice goddess.

Does she try it on now,or will she wait for Kuwabara to finish his fight?
1221.title: Street Vendor

choices: She continues to watch the tournament
12211.content:
Once wearing the necklace, the necklace emits a icy blue glow and starts to melt into Yukina's body!

"What the...?" Yukina asks, confused. Yukina starts to feel an awkward sensation, making her uneasy. However, the feeling starts to ebb away and Yukina feels as active and rejuvenated as ever. She starts to feel energy running down her legs, hips and more importantly, her chest area.

With every second, her legs and arms begin extending and her breasts start to expand. She is growing taller, bustier and sexier too! Her clothes are becoming tighter and her breasts begin to fill. Shocked at the growth, she starts to panic, trying to find a way to stop the growth.

Alas, all her efforts are futile and her breasts start to cause wear and tears at her clothes. Slowly but surely, Yukina is evolving into an amazon and her clothes are stretched to transparency. She tried to find the street vendor has disappeared! What will she do now?
12211.title: Now

12212.content:
Yukina didn't want to interupt the battle,so she decided to wait til later. Backstage,when she was about to get to her seat, Sakyo walked up to her.

"Who are you?" she asked.

"That is not the question you should be asking." he responded in a soft tone.

"What do you want?" she asked again.

"I want you to assist Toguro in his fight against Yusuke. Win by any means necessary." he demanded in the same tone of voice.

"But why?"

"If you don't,your little friend Kazuma will be hanged in front of you." he said,making her gasp.


Yusuke and Toguro were exchanging blows. Yukina didn't understand why she had to interfere,but alas she had no choice. Toguro did a massive powerbomb which seemed to have knocked Yusuke out cold.

"You don't know what it is to be a champion. I'm the best in the world. I came here for you!" Toguro shouted,well,tried to shout. The guys voice is lower than Steven Segal's.

The next thing the two fighters saw was a gigantic Yukina step into the arena. Who does she attack?
12212.title: Assistance from the outside

choices: Genkai's spirit gives Yusuke his second wind
122121.content:
"Forgive me Yusuke....." she said as she formed an icicle in her hand and shot it at him,the spear going right into his shoulder.

"Yukina...." Kuwabara was in shock,but that was nothing compared to the suprise Hiei felt. Not even Toguro understood,but he decided to capitalize on it.

"It was not wise to pick a fight with the dirtiest players in the game. Game over,Urameshi...." Toguro said as he picked poor Yusuke up and did a spinebuster that caused the ground to split.

What happens next?
122121.title: Capitalize the event

1221211.content:
Yusuke felt a power rush and he got up, his fists glowing blue.

"Thanks Genkai....wherever you are" he said as he looked at his two opponents. As tough as Toguro is, Yukina might pose more of a threat.

Who should he fight first?
1221211.title: 2 on 1

choices: Tell Yukina the truth....you know what I mean
1221212.content:
Hiei had to take responsibility for all this,so he stepped into the arena and took off his headband. There was something he had to do,something that the people who watch the show want.

And that is....?
1221212.title: Hiei's turn

choices: It doesn't affect her right away, so Botan continues her job
It does affect her right away, creating panic
123.content:
The list didn't seem that long. At least Botan thought as much as she flew over the city. The rest period between assisting Yusuke with his duties as Spirit Detective had her catching up with her primary job, Grim Reaper.

Her last assignment also seemed simple enough. It was to help a scientist cross over. He was going to die in a big explosion. Of course, if she knew what he was working with, she might have decided to come back later.

The building where the man lived, convintely close to the school where Yusuke attened, was burning to the ground. Inside, a man was laughing, oblivious to the fires around him.

"I've done it! I've created the matter changing formula! Soon I will control..."

The man's screams were drowned out as the building went up in a huge explosion, sending the chemical flying everywhere.

Landing right all over Botan as she landed to find the spirit.

"Oh, this is just gross!" shouted Botan as she was splashed in the chemical. "I should have taken the day off!"

Of course, unknown to Botan, the chemical was designed to change sizes. The specific batch she was splashed with expands matter...
123.title: Work hazards

1231.content:
Although it did put some stains on her clothes, she didn't feel much from it,yet at least. Suddenly,her shoes felt tight,so out of instinct she took them off. The chemicals hit her from the ankles up,so the rest of the clothes will grow with her.

"This is not my day...." she sighed, wondering what to do next. She will continuely grow throughout the day,but at a slow pace.
1231.title: Slowed effect

choices: "You seem taller? Did you get new shoes or something?"
12312.content:
Botan thought it was nothing and decided to return to Spirit World for her next assignment. She did notice things were a bit lower than usual. The thing that really got her was that when she got to Ogre, his eyes were level with her chin when they were once the same size.

"Reporting for duty sir!" Botan said in her cheerful tone.

Whats Koenma's reaction?
12312.title: Reporting back

1232.content:
Luck was not on Botan's side today as she quickly grew to about 50ft tall. One good side is that her clothes and oar grew with her,so she could continue her job. Problem is,she finally looks scary to humans.

"This....isn't something you see everyday." was all she could say as she looked down at the surroundings below. Everyone looked up in wonder and fear.

"Yusuke said the Grim Reaper is supposed to scare people,but I'm not sure if this is what he meant." she said,trying to look optimistic. She has two paths from here. One is to return to Spirit World and let Koenma help her. Or,if she wants to avoid getting yelled at,she can find Yusuke.
1232.title: Fear the Reaper?

12321.content:
The thought of returning to Spirit World to ask for help croseed Botan's mind for about 4 seconds before she vizualised Koenma's reaction.

"WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?! DO YOU HAVE ANY IDEA HOW MUCH TROUBLE I'M GOING TO BE IN WITH A 50 FOOT TALL REAPER?!" The added visuals of panicked demons and a very angry King Yemma did little to help.

She quickly decided visiting Koenma would not be the smart thing to do now. The closest person to her right now was Yusuke, so she decided visiting him might be a start.

Quickly taking to the air to avoid the panicked citizens, she hurridely flew towards Yusuke's house.

"I just hope I don't scare him to death when I finally do get there," she thought.
12321.title: Avoiding punishment

choices: Botan tries to gentlily nudge Yusuke awake.
Too late Kieko's come looking for Yusuke.
123211.content:
Botan had already flown most of the way to Yusuke's school without any problems, until it suddenly dawned on her that it was going to be very difficult to contact him without blowing his cover as spirit detective. For a moment she imagined him yelling, "Well what do you want me to do about it?" Which made her have second thoughts until she thought about what Koenma would do instead.

As stealthily as she could, which still got her spotted by hundreds of people, she came to the lowest possible hover she could over the school's roof. Luckily Yusuke was there as usual, taking a nap.

With a sigh of relief she tried to decide how to wake him up before anyone else came up here.
123211.title: As planned?

1232111.content:
No one seemed to be entering the room at the moment, so Botan quickly moved her finger through the window to nudge Yusuke awake, hoping that he wouldn't be surprised.

"Come on Yusuke, look, I wouldn't wake you up but this is important..."

Yusuke moved to and fro on his bed, but aside from the occasional piece of unintelligable mumbling, stayed silent.

Botan continued this for the next minute till she realized that simple nudging wasn't going to do the job. Pressing her finger into Yusuke's chest, she hoped that he would be feel the shock and awaken. Sure enough, it worked.

"Huh? What's going on?" Yusuke quickly attempted to push the finger off of him before he realized just what it was. Turning to the window, he saw the familiar face of Botan in a not-so-familair poistion, worry.

"Yusuke, can we talk?"
1232111.title: Wakey wakey...

12321112.content:
"AAAAHH! Uff." he says as he falls over the bed. Botan justs gives out a small giggle. Yusuke gets up quickly. "Botan. What the hell happened?"

"Well I was doing me job when a scientist splashed me with something and the next thing I know I'm 50ft. tall. So I came to you to see if you can help me."

Yusuke walk to the window and sat there. He started thinking on how to help her."Hm. How am I going suppose to help you? I can't think of anything." Botan then looks down in disappointment."Perfect she does something can't stand." he thinks. "Is there any item you can use?" She thinks for a moment.

"No." she says.

"Come think Yusuke think." he told himself quietly. "Did you already talk to Koenma?"

"Uh yes. Yes I did." she said lying.

"Perhaps we should talk to the others besides Kuwabura. Maybe they help um us I guess."

"Okay then." she said smiling to Yusuke.

"Botan hide!"

"Why?"

"Someone's come into my room." Then at nick of time she hid before Yusuke's mother came in.

"Yusuke. Who were where you talking to?"

"Great she heard me." he thought."No one. There no here. Look around for yourself." She headed for the window looked around to see no one. Then she shrugged and left.

"Phew." He ran to the window. "Botan."

"What?" Yusuke looked up to see Botan staring at him.

"Okay there you are. I'm going to get dressed then we'll leave. Alright?"

"Okay just hurry up?"

"So any idea's where to meet up at?"
12321112.title: Yusuke helps(Or trys to)

123212.content:
Botan flew through the skies,but she was already noticed. News and police helicopters flew all around her,curious and confused.

"Miss giant?! We would like to ask you a few questions! You will not be harmed!" came a shout from the news copter.

"What should I do? I like attention,but what if this gets out of hand?" Botan thought to herself. Maybe she can become a celebrity,maybe not.

Its all up to you.
123212.title: Chance of a lifetime

12322.content:
Botan decided to head back to Spirit World.
"I might get in trouble, but Koenma is sure to know of something that can help me."
She quickly flew across the border connecting Spirit World with the Human World and flew down the River Styx. In a matter of moments she was at Koenma's palace. She landed and found that she was too big to get in.
"Oh dear, this is a problem." She said trying to think of how to get to Koenma.
12322.title: In Spirit World...

A love present from Sakyo (On purpose)

info.brief_description: YYH Girls grow big, or guys get small. Please make additions!
info.description:
Girls from Yu Yu Hakusho grow into the sky, or guys shrink down to the ground. Please add chapters. Many stories die because of lack of additions. I'll add a few myself, but don't rely on me. You, the readers, need to contribute too!

The rules: Please try to keep sex stuff to a minimum. Also, keep the girls in-character. They're all pretty much good natured, but they might be destructive, however only in certain circumstances, such as if they're angered.

I will give GPs to the first 3 chapter adders. They have to be good, moderately sized chapters. All of them really should be.

(Holy heck, I had to retype this whole thing because I had too long of a description.)
